casebody.data:
John Patrick O'NEILL, JR., et al., petitioners,
v.
AL RAJHI BANK, et al.; and John Patrick O'Neill, Jr., et al., petitioners,
v.
Asat Trust Reg., et al. No. 13-318. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 16, 2013. The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States. Justice KAGAN took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
